name: .MGJSON File Extension
type_name: After Effects Motion Graphics JSON file
summary: Learn about .MGJSON files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: An MGJSON file is a motion graphics data file used by Adobe After Effects, a special effects video editing application. It contains data in a JSON-like that After Effects users input into a motion graphic to modify it. Data in an MGJSON file may be static or dynamic and can animate graphs, visual effects, titles, characters, and other types of motion graphics.

content: After Effects is a Windows and macOS application used to enhance video projects, such as Adobe Premiere Pro video projects (.PRPROJ files), with motion graphics. Video editors often use the software in post-production to enhance films, television shows, and video games.

The software supports various formats, including MGJSON, .JSON, .CSV, and .TSV, to input data into compositions to control motion graphics (known as data-driven animation). The MGJSON format is similar to a standard JSON file but also supports dynamic data instead of only static data values. Data in an MGJSON file may be generated from many types of sources, including websites, fitness trackers, or static user-entered data.

instructions: You can open an MGJSON file with Adobe After Effects (Windows and macOS). To open an MGJSON file, select File → Import → File..., navigate to the MGJSON file, and select Open. After Effects adds the file to your project window, and you can create a composition driven by the data in the file.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
